bibl.title: The God Abandons Antony: Alexandrian Street Theatre in 30 BC. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Supplément aux Annales du Service des Antiquités de l'Égypte. Cahier No.

bibl.title: Egyptian Culture and Society. Studies in Honour of Naguib Kanawati
bibl.author: HILLARD, Tom

bibl.note: Supplement to: T.W. HILLARD, R.A. KEARSLEY, C.E.V. NIXON and A.M. NOBBS (Edd.), Ancient History in a Modern University. Proceedings of a Conference Held at Macquarie University, 8-13 July 1993 to mark twenty-five years of the teaching of Ancient History at Macquarie University and the retirement from the Chair of Professor Edwin Judge. I. The Ancient Near East, Greece and Rome (Macquarie University, N.S.W. - Grand Rapids, Michigan - Cambridge, U.K., 1998) pp. 160-172. - An earlier of this version was read at the conference 'Images of Egypt: Cultural Interaction and Identity in Ancient Egypt', Macquarie University, 14-17 April, 2004.
